reviewText: I think it was quite rich for a short introductory course. Rocketry subjects are explored more deeply than other subjects like sustainability or project/technology management. It will spark curiosity to learn more. In terms of previous skills, you definitely do not need too much - some curiosity and some really basic math skills to understand the few equations discussed in this course. Thanks to the instructors and the staff involved!
E​xcellente introduction à ce domaine, ce cours a su satisfaire ma curiosité
